==GENERAL PROGRAMMING PARADIGMS==

[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Programming_paradigm]]

====a) object-oriented programming (as in Smalltalk)====
====b) aspect-oriented programming (as in AspectJ)====
====c) imperative programming <--> declarative programming====
====d) procedural programming <--> functional programming (Erlang, OCaml, Haskell, Scheme, ...)====
====e) class-based programming <!--> prototype-based programming (within the context of object-oriented programming)====
====f) component-oriented programming (as in OLE)====
====g) event driven programming====
====h) message passing programming, compared to imperative programming====
====i) visual programming / dataflow programming (directed graphs; boxes and arrows)====
